author: mturk
msg: Add new binary dist script that will create tomcat-connectors-ver-websrv-os-arch.zip instead insanely mainatining tens of dist subfolders which users must browse to find a dist. This way we'll have a single binary directory and user won't need to rename the .dll or .so files

author: marvin
msg: LUCY-162 Use shell to redirect Charmonizer stderr on Windows.

author: marvin
msg: LUCY-161 Don't use CreateHardLink under Cygwin.
Unlike othe Windows environments, Cygwin actually provides link() in unistd.h
-- so use it instead of CreateHardLink().
